|  [back](./reactivuety.router.back.md) | () =&gt; ReturnType&lt;[Router](./reactivuety.router.md)<!-- -->\['go'\]&gt; | Go back in history if possible by calling <code>history.back()</code>. Equivalent to <code>router.go(-1)</code>. |
|  [beforeEach](./reactivuety.router.beforeeach.md) | (guard: [NavigationGuardWithThis](./reactivuety.navigationguardwiththis.md)<!-- -->&lt;undefined&gt;) =&gt; () =&gt; void | Add a navigation guard that executes before any navigation. Returns a function that removes the registered guard. |
|  [beforeResolve](./reactivuety.router.beforeresolve.md) | (guard: [NavigationGuardWithThis](./reactivuety.navigationguardwiththis.md)<!-- -->&lt;undefined&gt;) =&gt; () =&gt; void | Add a navigation guard that executes before navigation is about to be resolved. At this state all component have been fetched and other navigation guards have been successful. Returns a function that removes the registered guard. |
|  [currentRoute](./reactivuety.router.currentroute.md) | Ref&lt;[RouteLocationNormalizedLoaded](./reactivuety.routelocationnormalizedloaded.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Current [RouteLocationNormalized](./reactivuety.routelocationnormalized.md) |
|  [forward](./reactivuety.router.forward.md) | () =&gt; ReturnType&lt;[Router](./reactivuety.router.md)<!-- -->\['go'\]&gt; | Go forward in history if possible by calling <code>history.forward()</code>. Equivalent to <code>router.go(1)</code>. |
|  [getRoutes](./reactivuety.router.getroutes.md) | () =&gt; [RouteRecord](./reactivuety.routerecord.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Get a full list of all the [route records](./reactivuety.routerecord.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [go](./reactivuety.router.go.md) | (delta: number) =&gt; void | Allows you to move forward or backward through the history. Calls <code>history.go()</code>. |
|  [hasRoute](./reactivuety.router.hasroute.md) | (name: [RouteRecordName](./reactivuety.routerecordname.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; boolean | Checks if a route with a given name exists |
|  [isReady](./reactivuety.router.isready.md) | () =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | Returns a Promise that resolves when the router has completed the initial navigation, which means it has resolved all async enter hooks and async components that are associated with the initial route. If the initial navigation already happened, the promise resolves immediately.<!-- -->This is useful in server-side rendering to ensure consistent output on both the server and the client. Note that on server side, you need to manually push the initial location while on client side, the router automatically picks it up from the URL. |
|  [onError](./reactivuety.router.onerror.md) | (handler: \_ErrorHandler) =&gt; () =&gt; void | Adds an error handler that is called every time a non caught error happens during navigation. This includes errors thrown synchronously and asynchronously, errors returned or passed to <code>next</code> in any navigation guard, and errors occurred when trying to resolve an async component that is required to render a route. |
|  [options](./reactivuety.router.options.md) | [RouterOptions](./reactivuety.routeroptions.md) | Original options object passed to create the Router |
|  [push](./reactivuety.router.push.md) | (to: [RouteLocationRaw](./reactivuety.routelocationraw.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;[NavigationFailure](./reactivuety.navigationfailure.md) \| void \| undefined&gt; | Programmatically navigate to a new URL by pushing an entry in the history stack. |
|  [removeRoute](./reactivuety.router.removeroute.md) | (name: [RouteRecordName](./reactivuety.routerecordname.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Remove an existing route by its name. |
|  [replace](./reactivuety.router.replace.md) | (to: [RouteLocationRaw](./reactivuety.routelocationraw.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;[NavigationFailure](./reactivuety.navigationfailure.md) \| void \| undefined&gt; | Programmatically navigate to a new URL by replacing the current entry in the history stack. |
|  [resolve](./reactivuety.router.resolve.md) | (to: [RouteLocationRaw](./reactivuety.routelocationraw.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [RouteLocation](./reactivuety.routelocation.md) &amp; { href: string; } | Returns the [normalized version](./reactivuety.routelocation.md) of a [route location](./reactivuety.routelocationraw.md)<!-- -->. Also includes an <code>href</code> property that includes any existing <code>base</code>. |
